item.description:
Join us for lunch at Wagamama's in Harvard Square. After lunch, we will take a short walk over to the Dragonboat Festival on the Charles River (Weeks Bridge) to enjoy the dragonboat races, cultural performances, arts & crafts. If you are still hungry or thirsty there are food vendors selling a wide variety of asian foods, bubble tea and zong zi.

Please be on time to Wagamama's. Wagamama's is a fairly big restaurant and can handle our large group. Come and enjoy the festive day.

Please update your RSVP if your plans change. We have an anti-flake policy. 

How to get there - take T (red line) to Harvard Sq and walk 3 blocks to Wagamama's. There is a parking lot nearby and you can get your tix validated by Wagamama's. But it is still a bit expensive - maybe $12 -15.

Click on the link for more info. http://www.bostondragonboat.org/

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch and Dragonboat Festival - Sunday
